item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:334810”]Your problem is

if (itemID == 4597) {
It shouldn’t be there at all…

That should be where your calling red() or blue() to begin with.
And it should be

if(playerEquipment[playerWHAT] == 4597) {
The WHAT can be cape hat plate legs w/e[/quote] Ok i fixed the other code problem but now theres a new one with the item on using to trigger the code above. Since im using a note that u click on in yur inv and it opens it when ever i set it i get this error.

client.java:9909: illegal start of expression public void red(); ^ client.java:9909: illegal start of expression public void red(); ^ client.java:9909: ';' expected public void red(); ^ client.java:9913: illegal start of expression public void blue(); ^ client.java:9913: illegal start of expression public void blue(); ^ client.java:9913: ';' expected public void blue(); ^ 6 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . . If you know why tell me so i can fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Your problem is

if (itemID == 4597) {
It shouldn’t be there at all…

That should be where your calling red() or blue() to begin with.
And it should be

if(playerEquipment[playerWHAT] == 4597) {
The WHAT can be cape hat plate legs w/e

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

I have been sitting here for 1hr trying to figure out what is wrong with these 2 codes, every time i compile it doesnt work and i don know why since its almost identicle to the code below it (not the one below the first one here the one in my client.java) If you spot anything wrong with it please tell me

public void red() { sendQuest("@dre@Welcome to the Red team!", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); if (itemID == 4597) { sendQuest("@whi@You have chosen the Red Team", 8146); sendQuest("@whi@to stay Alive,Protect You,Heal You", 8147); sendQuest("@whi@and FIGHT WITH YOU!.", 8148); sendQuest("@whi@Together we will destory", 8149); sendQuest("@whi@the Blue Team.", 8150); sendQuest("@whi@We are not cowards we will not run. ", 8151); sendQuest("@whi@we will fight to the death until", 8152); sendQuest("@whi@we are victorius!", 8153); sendQuest("@whi@Server Owner is Dan.", 8154); sendQuest("@whi@Server Co-Owner is Bryan Own.", 8155); sendQuest("@whi@Red Leader is Elv3z", 8156); sendQuest("@whi@Red Field Operations Commander is.", 8157); sendQuest("@whi@The Carl.", 8158); sendQuest("@whi@To get better items tele to", 8159); sendQuest("@whi@::supplys and ::advshops but watch out as", 8160); sendQuest("@whi@the Blue may be there ready to kill you.", 8161); sendQuest("@whi@There is a portal hidden somewere to the", 8162); sendQuest("@whi@SOUTH of your spawn which will teleport.", 8163); sendQuest("@whi@you to your enemys Outpost.", 8164); sendQuest("@whi@Watch your own outpost as Blue may be there.", 8165); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
public void blue() { sendQuest("@dre@Welcome to the Blue team!", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); if (itemID == 4598) { sendQuest("@whi@You have chosen the Blue Team", 8146); sendQuest("@whi@to stay Alive,Protect You,Heal You", 8147); sendQuest("@whi@and FIGHT WITH YOU!.", 8148); sendQuest("@whi@Together we will defeat", 8149); sendQuest("@whi@the Evil Red Team.", 8150); sendQuest("@whi@We are not cowards we will not run. ", 8151); sendQuest("@whi@We will fight to the death until", 8152); sendQuest("@whi@we are victorius!", 8153); sendQuest("@whi@Server Owner is Dan.", 8154); sendQuest("@whi@Server Co-Owner is Bryan Own.", 8155); sendQuest("@whi@Blue Leader is Grim", 8156); sendQuest("@whi@Blue Field Operations Commander is.", 8157); sendQuest("@whi@Zodem.", 8158); sendQuest("@whi@To get better items tele to", 8159); sendQuest("@whi@::supplys and ::advshops but watch out as", 8160); sendQuest("@whi@the Red may be there ready to kill you.", 8161); sendQuest("@whi@There is a portal hidden somewere to the", 8162); sendQuest("@whi@SOUTH of your spawn which will teleport.", 8163); sendQuest("@whi@you to your enemys Outpost.", 8164); sendQuest("@whi@Watch your own outpost as Red may be there.", 8165); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
